dt: {bc}an acute contagious disease especially of children marked by low-grade fever and formation of vesicles and caused by a herpesvirus (species {it}Human herpesvirus 3{/it} of the genus {it}Varicellovirus{/it}) {dx}compare {dxt|shingles||}{/dx}

shortdef: an acute contagious disease especially of children marked by low-grade fever and formation of vesicles and caused by a herpesvirus (species Human herpesvirus 3 of the genus Varicellovirus)
